document.full_text: rising inflation, higher commodity prices and lower global economic growth will weigh on margins of s&p 500  companies, said goldman sachs, as it forecast a lower 2012 earnings outlook, and reduced its year-end target on the index.
document.title: goldman lowers year-end target for s&p 500 index
lines_and_colors: rising inflation, higher commodity prices and lower global economic growth will weigh on margins of s&p 500  companies, said goldman sachs, as it forecast a lower 2012 earnings outlook, and reduced its year-end target on the index.
